title: Christina Applegate
summary: Christina Applegate (born November 25, 1971)[2] is an American actress. As a child actress, she gained recognition for starring as Kelly Bundy on the Fox sitcom Married... with Children (1987â€“1997). Applegate established a successful film and television career in her adult years, winning a Primetime Emmy Award from seven nominations as well as nominations for four Golden Globe Awards and a Tony Award.
